div.p: Well I received a letter from you saturday Was awful glad to here from you even if it was seven weeks old The letter was dated 19 of June and I got it on the 3 of Aug. So you can see how good our mail service is over here.
Well it has been trying to rain all day. But that is the easyist thing on earth for this country. I had to laugh at Arrto day while it was raining a little shower

He said this is a H___ of a country to be fighting over Well we are still giving the Germans a good licking of course you read it in the papers at home you know as much about it as I do for I am not where the big fight is going on
I dont thank will get home for X Mas dinner I have decide to take dinner in Berlin on X Mas. And then after dinner I will go out walking and look the town over

I know you was glad to see Peachie come back so you could see your little neice. Bet she is some kid, well Ellen news is awful scarce overhere that I can tell so will have to quit for this time will try and write more next week
So write me every time you can I do enjoy your letters
